node.html:
• Actively contribute to the development and improvement of internal systems and public-facing websites at the university
  • Built a modern, user-friendly frontend interface for the university's student admission system (qabul.xiuedu.uz)
  • Collaborate closely with designers and backend developers to deliver technical solutions that enhance user experience
  • Help improve team productivity by applying modern technologies in the development of the university’s digital products

• Participated in the “Ustoz” mentorship program to gain hands-on experience in frontend development and modern web technologies
  • Developed responsive and user-friendly components using Vue.js and Tailwind CSS under the guidance of senior engineers
  • Collaborated on real-world projects, contributing to UI implementation, bug fixes, and performance improvements
  • Gained experience working in a team environment with version control (Git), code reviews, and Agile workflow

• Led the digital transformation of factory operations by developing custom CRM tools and internal web-based systems to streamline sales, orders, and inventory management
  • Designed and launched user-friendly digital solutions to simplify internal workflows and improve communication between departments
  • Oversaw the development and execution of the company's digital marketing strategy, including content planning, Instagram growth, and video production for product promotion
  • Produced engaging visual content and instructional videos to enhance the company’s online presence and attract new clients
  • Collaborated with the executive team to align technical solutions with business goals, resulting in increased efficiency and stronger brand visibility

• Founded and managed CodeTech Academy MCHJ to provide web development training and build software solutions for clients across various industries
  • Engineered and deployed full-stack web applications using modern frameworks including Vue.js, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS
  • Delivered scalable web platforms for educational and business purposes, tailored to specific client needs
  • Led a team of junior developers and interns, ensuring code quality, knowledge sharing, and timely project delivery

• Collaborated with university staff and fellow developers to build and improve web-based systems for academic and administrative use
  • Contributed to the development of internal dashboards and informational portals, focusing on responsive UI and accessibility
  • Helped modernize outdated pages by applying reusable components and clean design principles
  • Delivered reliable technical solutions aligned with institutional goals and stakeholder requirements
